entry.string: When you are finished with translating all the relevant parts of xaraya (core, modules etc.) you can package the translation.
entry.translation: Vhee yuoo ere-a feenished veet trunsleteeng ell zee relefunt perts ooff xereya (cure-a, mudooles itc.) yuoo cun peckege-a zee trunsleshun.

entry.string: Choose the locale you want to generate translations for
entry.translation: Chuuse-a zee lucele-a yuoo vunt tu generete-a trunsleshuns fur

entry.string: Now we're going to generate translations, this operation could take several minutes. Just take a break!
entry.translation: Noo ve're-a gueeng tu generete-a trunsleshuns, thees oopereshun cuoold teke-a seferel meenootes. Um gesh dee bork, bork! Joost teke-a a breek!

entry.string: Then we'll create a translations package using the '#(1)' archiver command.
entry.translation: Zeen ve'll creete-a a trunsleshuns peckege-a useeng zee '#(1)' ercheefer cummund. Bork bork bork!
